section.title: Dashboard configuration
section.para: The following parameters are available controll the Dashboard configuration (when in edit mode):

listitem.para: if empty, everyone share the same dashboard and can edit it
if set to CURRENTUSER , every user has his own dashboard
if set to a username, everyone will see the dashboard of this person
if set to 1, only the owner of the dashboard can edit it
if set to 0, everyone can edit it
